meanings.definition: To thrust out or force out
meanings.sent1: The toothpaste was extruding from the tube.
meanings.sent2: The machine was extruding plastic to create a new toy.
meanings.sent3: The silly clown tried extruding confetti from his nose.
meanings.sent4: The sun was extruding warmth into the room.
meanings.sent5: The volcano was extruding lava in a fiery display.

meanings.definition: To shape or form by forcing through a die
meanings.sent1: She was extruding playdough through a mold to make a star shape.
meanings.sent2: The factory was extruding metal rods for construction purposes.
meanings.sent3: The chef tried extruding spaghetti through a tiny hole, but it got messy.
meanings.sent4: The artist was extruding creativity into every piece of her work.
meanings.sent5: The 3D printer was extruding intricate designs with precision.
